title: Deportivo Iztapa
text:
Club Deportivo Iztapa, is a Guatemalan <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Iztapa">Iztapa</a>, <a href="Escuintla%20Department">Escuintla Department</a>. It plays their home games in the Estadio Municipal Morón.
They compete in the <a href="Liga%20Nacional%20de%20F%C3%BAtbol%20de%20Guatemala">Liga Nacional</a>, the top tier of Guatemalan football.
